glosses: a village in Arhavi district, Artvin Province, Turkey
a village in Diyadin district, Ağrı Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Elazığ district, Elazığ Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Menemen district, İzmir Province, Turkey
a neighbourhood in Tavas district, Denizli Province, Turkey

etymology: By surface analysis, ulu (“great, grand, lofty”) + kent (“city”).
